summary: The humorous adventures of the notorious Scottish highwayman and thief Davey Haggart during the 1820s in Britain.
cast: John Hurt|Pamela Franklin|Nigel Davenport|Ronald Fraser|Robert Morley|Fidelma Murphy|Maxine Audley|Fionnula Flanagan|Donal McCann|Allan Cuthbertson|Eddie Byrne|Niall MacGinnis|Noel Purcell|Judith Furse|Francis De Wolff|Paul Farrell|Geoffrey Golden|Leon Collins|John Franklyn|Brenda Fricker|Anjelica Huston|Eileen Murphy|Mickser Reid|Derek Young
title: La horca puede esperar
